alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, north central Taylor, northeastern Leon, Madison, southern Grady, southern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Havana to near Monticello to 22 miles northwest of Perry. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Monticello, Madison, Greenville, Alma, Cody, Everett, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Drifton, Lovett, Lake Miccosukee, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Chaires Crossroads, Festus, Hopewell, Aucilla, Baum and Lois. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Leon; Madison
